prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon resembling a fortress with a spiky exterior and a tough body.
I want a bug-type Pokemon that has a round shape, metallic colors, and a defensive stance.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a defensive structure, with a unique color pattern and sturdy features.
Make a Pokemon that embodies resilience, featuring a shell-like body and prominent spikes.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a rolling fortress, using its hard exterior as armor in battles.
Design a Pokemon with a complex structure, showcasing both strength and intricate patterns on its body.
Show me a Pokemon inspired by nature, combining steel elements with a natural habitat.
